description:
Submission of Details pursuant to Condition 52 (Digital Connectivity) of Planning Permission reference HGY/2022/0752:

Council Depot, Ashley Road, London, N17 9DP - Full planning application for the erection of 272 homes including 50% socially rented homes extending 4-13 storeys, 174sqm of flexible Use Class E floorspace along with a new vehicular access to the site, car parking and two pedestrian north south routes. The proposal also includes both private and public hard and soft landscaping throughout the site, as approved on: 31/08/2022.
site_name: Accord House, Ashley Road, Tottenham, London, N17 9AZ
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
